Header: WATCH: Couple Gets Married 90 Meters Mid-Air On A Ropeway
Content: Normally we witness marriage inside a tent or in a temple but have you ever witnessed a wedding in which the groom and the bride are swinging in the air with a harness while hanging with a ropeway, 90 meters above the ground? Call them daredevils because this couple tied the knot hanging 90 metres above ground. In Kolhapur in India, exactly this has happened when Zehdir and Reshma married literally "in the air". The couple garlanded each other with live commentary going on at the ground for the guests. The Kolhapur bride and the groom - who had met and fallen in love while trekking - hung from a ropeway and went about their nuptials like it was no big deal. Reportedly, both are great lovers of trekking, while doing which they actually met and fell in love. All precautions were taken keeping in mind the safety of the couple. Zehdir and Reshma adorned one another with garlands while the crowd beneath cheered them on. A running commentary was on to apprise the onlookers of this one-of-a-kind ceremony.
